Package org.parosproxy.paros.security

Interface SslCertificateService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CachedSslCertifificateServiceImpl, SslCertificateServiceImpl
@Deprecated public interface SslCertificateService
Deprecated.
Create SSL certificates on the fly, signed by Paros Proxy CA.

  • Method Details

    • createCertForHost

      KeyStore createCertForHost(String hostname) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeyException, CertificateException, NoSuchProviderException, SignatureException, KeyStoreException, IOException, UnrecoverableKeyException
      Deprecated.
      Generate a certificate signed by our CA's intermediate certificate. Thy certificate, private key and public key are returned in one KeyStore available with alias ZAPROXY_JKS_ALIAS.
      Parameters:
      hostname -
      Returns:
      a KeyStore which contains root certificate, signed certificate, private key and public key of signed certificate
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      InvalidKeyException
      CertificateException
      NoSuchProviderException
      SignatureException
      KeyStoreException
      IOException
      UnrecoverableKeyException
      MissingRootCertificateException - when it wasn't initialized.

      Returns:
